actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-624.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of S. 423, an act to promote commerce by establishing a national goal for the development and maintenance of effective, fair, inexpensive, and expeditious mechanisms for the resolution of consumer controversies, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of S. 423 (Resolution of consumer controversies).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of S. 423, an act to promote commerce by establishing a national goal for the development and maintenance of effective, fair, inexpensive, and expeditious mechanisms for the resolution of consumer controversies, and for other purposes.
